availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Uniontown, Kentucky, saddler. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret A. Orme. Father of George G. Orme. Saddler in Uniontown in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Union County, Uniontown, p. 217.; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Union County, Uniontown, p. 9; Find A Grave, "George Orme (1826-1905)," Memorial #106887645, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=106887645&ref=acom (accessed May 5, 2017).
